item.title: I-29 South - Welcome To Iowa
item.description: The People of Iowa Welcome You on I-29 south. At the end of the Big Sioux River bridge at the South Dakota - Iowa state line.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south at Exit 144 - I-129 West/US-20 West/US-75 South/South Sioux City (NE)/US-20 East/US-75 North/LeMars/Fort Dodge. I-29 continues southbound to Council Bluffs.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south approaching Exit 144 - I-129/US-20/US-75/South Sioux City (NE)/LeMars/Fort Dodge.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 144
item.description: I-29 south approaching Exit 144 - I-129/US-20/US-75 in Sioux Falls.

item.title: I-29 South - Exit 149
item.description: I-29 south approaching Exit 149 - US-77 South/Hamilton Blvd/Wesley Parkway/South Sioux City (NE). I-29 continues south to Council Bluffs.

item.title: End IA-12 South at I-29 South
item.description: End IA-12 South at I-29 South to Council Bluffs.

item.title: I-29 South Exit 151 Offramp at IA-12
item.description: I-29 South Exit 151 offramp at IA-12. Turn left on IA-12 north for Riverside Blvd., Stone State Park, Dorothy Peanut Nature Center.

item.title: I-29 South - Welcome To Iowa
item.description: Welcome to Iowa on I-29 south in Sioux City.

item.title: Two Rivers Drive West at I-29 South
item.description: Two Rivers Drive west at I-29 South in Union County.

item.title: I-29 North - Exit 1
item.description: I-29 north at Exit 1 - Dakota Dunes. This is the first exit in South Dakota on I-29 northbound.

item.title: I-29 North - Welcome To South Dakota
item.description: Welcome to South Dakota on I-29 north.

item.title: I-29 North - Big Sioux River
item.description: I-29 north at the Big Sioux River. The Big Sioux River marks the state line between Iowa and South Dakota.

item.title: I-29 North - South Dakota Exit 1
item.description: I-29 North - Exit 1 (South Dakota) - Dakota Dunes. Approaching the South Dakota state line.

item.title: I-29 North - Exit 151
item.description: I-29 North approaching Exit 151 - IA-12 North/Riverside Blvd. Continue north on I-29 to Sioux Falls (SD). This is the last exit in Iowa northbound.
